entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Deterministically resolve the "auto" render mode to "server" or "webassembly" #49580
    8.0-rc1
  • App styles bundle not found when running the app locally using the Production environment #49577
  • Using Blazor for the error handling results in "no submit handler was found with that name" error when dealing with post requests #49576
  • TagHelpers don't render content in .NET7 #49574
  • Incorrect placement of identifiers #49573
  • Developer exception page renders as plain text in Blazor Web App when doing an enhanced navigation #49571
  • BWA/WASM templates embrace H1 top-level headers but RC template doesn't #49570
  • Localised decimal type value cannot be set on input type number #49564
  • Please consider creating self-contained installed bundles #49562

Closed

  • WebApiAot project template ApiApplication words not updated #49529
  • SignalR working even with API down WFT????? #49453
  • Auto switching for interactive components #46397
    8.0-preview7
  • How to get http request headers accept value? #49535
  • macOS uses port 5000 #48932

PullRequests

Created

  • Reduce allocations from route matching #49579
    area-runtime
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2227027 #49575
    area-mvc
  • Add a .http file to WebAPI project template #49561
    area-mvc, community-contribution

Merged

  • WebApiAot project template WebApplication1 instead of ApiApplication1 #49563
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 8.0-rc1
  • [release/8.0-preview7] [Blazor] Support for determining the render mode dynamically #49578
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 8.0-preview7
  • [Blazor] Support for determining the render mode dynamically #49477
    area-blazor, 8.0-rc1
  • [release/8.0-preview7] Add more MapIdentityApi endpoints #49559
    Servicing-approved, area-identity, 8.0-preview7
  • Update JwtBearer, WsFed, and OIDC handlers to use identity model 7 #49541
    area-security, community-contribution, 8.0-rc1
  • Update JwtBearer, WsFed, and OIDC handlers to use identity model 7 #49542
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-security, community-contribution, 8.0-preview7
  • [release/8.0-preview7] [Blazor] Improvements to the interaction between SSR and interactive rendering #49557
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 8.0-preview7
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `cc36671` to `1ed6a8c` #49568
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-rc1
  • Redis distributed/output cache: include scenario in connection metadata #49291
    area-runtime, feature-output-caching, 8.0-rc1

Updated

  • [SignalR] Harden MessageBuffer #49423
    area-signalr
  • Reduce record usage in published projects #48907
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Add more MapIdentityApi endpoints #49498
    area-identity
  • Support for X-Forwarded-Prefix in ForwardedHeadersMiddleware #49249
    area-runtime, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Simplify BoxedStatusCodes storage in HostingMetrics.cs #49332
    area-hosting
  • Remove stack overflow in EndpointFilterInvocationContexts #49285
    area-runtime, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • [blazor][wasm] Dispatch rendering to main thread #48991
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-wasm, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0
  • [hotreload] Change file encode #49247
    area-mvc, pending-ci-rerun
  • fix: Account for form attribute on checkbox tag input helper #49201 #49323
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Return LockedOut result from TwoFactorSignInAsync after a failed call #49337
    area-identity, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • [release/6.0] Move to MacOS 13 #49367
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, * NO MERGE *, pending-ci-rerun, 6.0.x
  • [wasm][debugger] Support NO_PROXY": "localhost" in launchSettings.json #49395
    area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun
  • Remove array allocations routing in common cases #49539
    Perf, area-runtime
  • Improve performance of output cache #48328
    feature-middleware, area-perf, feature-output-caching, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware
  • Draft: Add RedirectToActionOther method. #48823
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Update SDK to 8.0.100-preview.7.23364.32 #49470
    area-infrastructure
